translations: 属于；……的；……的一部分；住在（某地）；关于；由……组成的；因为；（表示人或事的时空位置）在，当

sentences.sentence: One of the penalties of fame is loss of privacy.
sentences.translation: 成名的弊端之一是失掉了隐私。

sentences.sentence: Lack of traffic is one of the blessings of country life.
sentences.translation: 往来车辆少是乡村生活的一大好处。

sentences.sentence: There were periods of sulking, of pronounced distance, of coldness.
sentences.translation: 出现阶段性的愠怒、明显的疏远和冷淡。
